snippet.title: IMPRESSIONISTa Water Lilies Game Trailer #monet #metaverse #impressionism
snippet.description:
DO YOU DREAM WALKING INSIDE A PAINTING?

ENTER CLAUDE MONET WORLD! 
A SHORT, CONTEMPLATIVE EXPERIENCE FOR FINE ARTS LOVERS!
A FUN  WAY TO LEARN ART.  Our purpose is to spark interest and delight Fine Arts enthusiasts.

Imagine yourself at an art gallery... You get closer to Claude Monet´s "Bridge over water lilies pond" painting and magically is transposed to it!

DOWNLOAD GAME:
https://gigoiastudios.itch.io/impressionista-water-lilies

* The use of videos / games / soundtracks belonging to Gigoia Studios are for personal entertainment only and can not be marketed, altered, resold or used for other purposes without prior authorization from Gigoia Studios.
Gigoia Studios videos are under YouTube Standard License.
